author: Morgan Chalfant
title: Trump criticizes WHO, calls it 'very China centric'
description: President Trump on Tuesday criticized the World Health Organization (WHO) over its handling of the coronavirus pandemic and called the organization "very China centric.""The W.H.O. really blew...
